flawed_nl_solution:
He gets his pool cleaned 30/3=<<30/3=10>>10 times a month
Each time he gets it cleaned he tips 150*0.1=$<<150*0.1=15>>15
So he pays 150+15=$<<150+15=165>>165
So he pays 165*10=$<<165*10=1650>>1650 a month on cleaning
The chemicals cost 200*2=$<<200*2=40>>40
So in total, he pays 1650+40=$<<1650+40=1690>>1690
#### 1690

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 400, not 40. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
